# Shape Areas

A Python package to calculate areas of common plane shapes.

## Installation

```bash
pip install shape-areas
```

## Usage
```python
from shape_areas.shape_areas import ShapeArea

area = ShapeArea()
print("Square area: ", area.square(2))
## 4.0
```
